pinyin: Nuo4 bei4 er3 He2 ping2 jiang3

definition: and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: He himself is a perennial Nobel also-ran.
sentences.chinese: 他自己就長年是諾貝爾和平獎落選者。

sentences.english: Nominations for the Nobel Peace Prize are not open to the public.
sentences.chinese: 爲諾貝爾和平獎的提名是不向公衆開放的。

sentences.english: And that's why the next Nobel Peace Prize should go to the Net.
sentences.chinese: 這就是下一屆諾貝爾和平獎應該辦法給互聯網的原因。

sentences.english: So how did I feel when I was actually awarded the Nobel Prize for Peace?
sentences.chinese: 那當我真的獲得諾貝爾和平獎之後是什麼感覺呢？

sentences.english: Mother Teresa won the Nobel Peace Prize in 1979.
sentences.chinese: 德蕾莎修女在一九七九年獲得諾貝爾和平獎。

sentences.english: I have a question concerning the Nobel Prize for Peace.
sentences.chinese: 我想請問一個關於諾貝爾和平獎的問題。

sentences.english: Do you think the Internet should be awarded the Nobel Peace Prize?
sentences.chinese: 你認爲英特網應該獲得這次的諾貝爾和平獎麼？

sentences.english: And now Obama is the Nobel Peace Prize winner.
sentences.chinese: 現在，奧巴馬是諾貝爾和平獎獲得者了。

sentences.english: Ann: Yes, the Nobel Peace Prize is an inhibiting magic phrase.
sentences.chinese: 對啊，諾貝爾和平獎就是緊箍咒。

sentences.english: China thinks nothing of jailing a Nobel laureate and threatening trade sanctions against countries that attend the prize ceremony.
sentences.chinese: 中國則會阻止其諾貝爾和平獎獲獎者參加頒獎儀式。

sentences.english: What follows is the process of his being awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1964.
sentences.chinese: 以下是他被頒贈一九六四年諾貝爾和平獎的過程。

sentences.english: WESTLIFE sends their congratulations to President Kim Daejung on winning the Nobel Peace prize.
sentences.chinese: 西城男孩向金大中主席恭賀他獲得諾貝爾和平獎。

sentences.english: Lin, you should win a Nobel Peace Prize sometimes in your life time.
sentences.chinese: 林，你應該在有生之年獲得諾貝爾和平獎。

sentences.english: In your opinion, what's the main reason that you were honored the Nobel Prize for Peace?
sentences.chinese: 依您之見，您獲得諾貝爾和平獎的主要原因是什麼？

sentences.english: He was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990.
sentences.chinese: 1990年，戈氏被授予諾貝爾和平獎。

sentences.english: Indeed, the reasoning behind the awarding of the prize to previous American presidents has been easier to discern.
sentences.chinese: 之前幾位獲得諾貝爾和平獎的美國總統的確實至名歸。

pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Hong2 Shi2 zi4 hui4

definition: to regard it as an honor (idiom)
Ruyuan Yao Autonomous County in Shaoguan 韶關|韶关[Shao2 guan1], Guangdong
General Douglas MacArthur (1880-1964), US commander in Pacific during WW2, sacked in 1951 by President Truman for exceeding orders during the Korean war
